creator: brownf@us.ibm.com
text:
The parser does not correctly parse a line like this (with underscore in 
selector):

.small_j                { font-size: 12px; text-align: justify }

This shows up in the stylesheet file photo.css in www.dpreview.com.
The parser doesn't just skip this and go on either.

creator: brownf@us.ibm.com
text:
Oops.. should have said it DOESN't correctly parse the selector in a stylesheet 
that has an underscore such as found in the file photo.css referenced in a link 
tag in www.dpreview.com

creator: hillion@apache.org
text: according to the CSS2 spec, '_' is forbidden in identifiers.
